topic.title: 병원 예약 및 진료 상담
topic.description: 병원 예약부터 진료 상담까지의 의료진과의 대화 상황을 학습합니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕하세요, 내과 진료 예약을 하고 싶습니다.
다음 주 화요일 오후에 가능한 시간이 있나요?
최근에 속이 자주 아프고 소화가 잘 안 되는 것 같아요.
처음 방문하는 환자라서 어떤 서류를 준비해야 하는지 궁금합니다.
진료비는 대략 얼마 정도 예상하면 될까요?
그리고 진료 전에 금식을 해야 하는지도 알고 싶습니다.
네, 예약이 확정되었다면 시간에 맞춰 방문하겠습니다.
혹시 진료 당일에 응급상황이 생기면 어떻게 해야 하나요?
병원 위치와 주차 시설 정보도 알려주실 수 있나요?
감사합니다. 그럼 예약 확인서를 문자로 보내주세요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I would like to make an appointment for internal medicine.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I would like to make an appointment | for internal medicine.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Are there any available times next Tuesday afternoon?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Are there any available times | next Tuesday afternoon?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Recently, my stomach hurts frequently and I don't seem to digest well.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Recently, | my stomach hurts frequently | and I don't seem to digest well.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Since I'm a first-time patient, I'm wondering what documents I need to prepare.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Since I'm a first-time patient, | I'm wondering | what documents I need to prepare.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Would it be okay if I bring my insurance card and ID?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Would it be okay | if I bring my insurance card and ID?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: How much should I expect to pay for the consultation?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: How much should I expect to pay | for the consultation?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: And I'd also like to know if I need to fast before the examination.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: And I'd also like to know | if I need to fast | before the examination.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, if the appointment is confirmed, I'll visit on time.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | if the appointment is confirmed, | I'll visit on time.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: What should I do if an emergency situation occurs on the day of the appointment?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: What should I do | if an emergency situation occurs | on the day of the appointment?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Could you also give me information about the hospital location and parking facilities?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Could you also give me information | about the hospital location | and parking facilities?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Thank you. Then please send me the appointment confirmation via text message.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Thank you. | Then please send me | the appointment confirmation | via text message.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: Hello, I would like to make an appointment for internal medicine.
Are there any available times next Tuesday afternoon?
Recently, my stomach hurts frequently and I don't seem to digest well.
Since I'm a first-time patient, I'm wondering what documents I need to prepare.
Would it be okay if I bring my insurance card and ID?
How much should I expect to pay for the consultation?
And I'd also like to know if I need to fast before the examination.
Yes, if the appointment is confirmed, I'll visit on time.
What should I do if an emergency situation occurs on the day of the appointment?
Could you also give me information about the hospital location and parking facilities?
Thank you. Then please send me the appointment confirmation via text message.

learning_points.foreign_phrase: I would like to make an appointment
what documents I need to prepare
if I bring my insurance card and ID

highlight_sentences.korean_text: 처음 방문하는 환자라서 어떤 서류를 준비해야 하는지 궁금합니다.
highlight_sentences.foreign_text: Since I'm a first-time patient, I'm wondering what documents I need to prepare.
highlight_sentences.reason: 이유를 나타내는 'since' 절과 간접의문문 구조를 포함하여 의료 상황에서 정보를 요청하는 정중한 표현 방식을 학습할 수 있습니다.
